overview: Rites of Passage The MAN ACADEMY will teach you what you need to know. In Part 2, "Rites of Passage" these jocks are forced to service the raw, wild needs of their upper-class buddies, led by superstar Brock Masters, sporting his gargantuan cock and perfect, chiseled body. They tongue them, stretch them and plow into them with selfish lustful abandon. From classroom discipline to outdoor survival training,to fitness courses to the final rite of passage ceremony, watch two-ways, three-ways and four-ways of intense sexual thrills in this 125 minute epic passage of manhood.
tagline: The Man Academy will teach you what you need to know.
title: Man Academy 2: Rites of Passage
